entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , London
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 8:08 PM EST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -0.9°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: London Int'l Airport 9:00 PM EST Wednesday 25 January 2023
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -0.9°C
Pressure / Tendency: 99.7 kPa falling
Visibility: 2.4 km
Humidity: 96 %
Wind Chill: -5
Dewpoint: -1.4°C
Wind: ENE 14 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Wednesday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 2.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Amount 2 cm. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 after midnight. Low minus 2. Wind chill minus 8 overnight. Forecast issued 8:21 PM EST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday: A few flurries. High zero.
entry.summary: Flurries. Local amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light early in the afternoon. High zero. Wind chill minus 8 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 8:21 PM EST Wednesday 25 January 2023
